what pre. -ni? (enum.st. or encl.) e.g ‘what time is it?’ : sikhatsi sini? ‘ ~ kind i it’?” luhlobo luni? ‘ ~ is it?’: yini? ‘ with /and ~ else ?’: nami futsi ? ‘by ~ means ?
